speaker: Phoenix
text: Today we'll be demonstrating some new visual novel features.

text: I'm excited to show off our expressions!

speaker: Phoenix
text: Let me show you how expressions work.

speaker: Phoenix
text: I can change my expression mid-conversation...

text: ...and even laugh about it!

text: Let me try too!

text: I can look confident...

text: Now I'll demonstrate how expressions can work for a character who isn't speaking.

text: Watch as Phoenix reacts to what I'm saying.

text: Let's give the player a choice now.

text: Tell me about your recent court cases, Phoenix.

text: Well, I just wrapped up a rather complicated murder trial.

text: The defendant was actually innocent, as I suspected.

text: Daddy always knows when his clients are telling the truth!

text: Trucy, can you show us a new magic trick?

text: I thought you'd never ask!

speaker: Trucy
text: For my next trick, I'll need a volunteer...

speaker: Phoenix
text: Why are you both looking at me?

text: I think that covers all the new features.

speaker: Trucy

speaker: Apollo
text: Right! Let's wrap this up.
